thumb.title: 【LOID】そう言ってよ ～Rockin N Rollin Remix～ (Revision)【リミックス曲】
thumb.description: It's a remaster of a previous remix!I disliked the original version I made, as Loid's voice was out of sync with the music. I've fixed that now though ^^CREDITS:Say So - Doja CatJapanese Lyrics - RainychOriginal Remix - AshPRemix-of-remix - MeLoid V1A SOLID - MeCopyright Disclaimer: - Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for FAIR USE for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statutes that might otherwise be infringing. Non-Profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favour of FAIR USE. I do not claim ownership over the original song.
